# base-css-image-loader

A base loader for processing images in CSS

[![CircleCI][circleci-img]][circleci-url]
[![NPM Version][npm-img]][npm-url]
[![Dependencies][david-img]][david-url]
[![NPM Download][download-img]][download-url]

## Develop

### dev

``` shell
npm run dev
```

### build

``` shell
npm run build
```

### test

``` shell
npm run test
```

``` shell
npm run test:unit
```
